results.title: Elevated ferritin, mediated by IL-18 is associated with systemic inflammation and mortality in acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS).
results.text_hl: METHODS: Baseline plasma ferritin concentrations were measured in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Respiratory_Distress_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D012128 @@@ARDS@@@ from two randomised controlled trials of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ (@GENE_HMGCR @GENE_3156 @@@Hydroxymethylglutaryl-CoA Reductase@@@ Inhibition with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ in @DISEASE_Acute_Lung_Injury @DISEASE_MESH:D055371 @@@Acute Lung Injury@@@ to Reduce @<m>DISEASE_614113</m> @DISEASE_OMIM:614113 @@@Pulmonary Dysfunction-2@@@ (@DISEASE_Encephalitis_Herpes_Simplex @DISEASE_MESH:D020803 @@@HARP-2@@@); discovery cohort, UK) and @DISEASE_Neuromuscular_Manifestations @DISEASE_MESH:D020879 @@@neuromuscular blockade@@@ (ROSE; validation cohort, USA).

citations.NLM: Mehta P, Samanta RJ, Wick K, Coll RC, Mawhinney T, McAleavey PG, Boyle AJ, Conlon J, Shankar-Hari M, Rogers A, Calfee CS, Matthay MA, Summers C, Chambers RC, McAuley DF, O'Kane CM. Elevated ferritin, mediated by IL-18 is associated with systemic inflammation and mortality in acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS). Thorax. 2023 Dec 26;():. PMID: 38148147
